short_summary: Cleaning Compound bid notice for CFB Halifax and Esquimalt
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia Item 1 CLEANING COMPOUND Part No.: ZOK 27, NCAGE: 02ZK3, ZOK INC Quantity: 300, Unit of Issue: CO, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia Item 2, CLEANING COMPOUND Part No.: ZOK 27, NCAGE: 02ZK3, ZOK INC Quantity: 300, Unit of Issue: CO, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected The requirement does not offer exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation. Requests for exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation will not be considered. All bids including such provision will render the bid non-responsive The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

The Department of National Defence (DND) has released a notification regarding the procurement of **Cleaning Compounds** with the reference number *cb-271-83299204*.

#### Tender Details

* Bid Number: *w8482-241925*
* State: *Cancelled*
* Procurement Method: *Competitive - Open Bidding*
* Notice Type: *Request for Proposal*
* Selection Criteria: *Lowest Price*
* Trade Agreements: *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other trade agreements*
* Region of Opportunity: *World*
* Region of Delivery: *British Columbia and Halifax*.

#### Tender Description

The DND is seeking to procure two types of **Cleaning Compounds**. The first item (ZOK 27, NAC: 02ZK3, ZOK INC) needs to be delivered in the quantity of 300 units, to be issued in CO quantities, to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. The second item is identical to the first as an exact match or substitute product. 

Bidders are required to submit their prices in CAD only. Proposal submissions in foreign currencies will be rejected.

Please note that the Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. 

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. For further information on this tender, refer to the attachments provided.

#### Contact Information
You can reach the contracting officer at:

* Name: Ashley Nadeau-Weeks
* Email: Ashley.Nadeau-Weeks@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 555-555-5555

### Attachments

* English RFP Clauses: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29207/w8482-241925---english-rfp-clauses.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29207/w8482-241925---english-rfp-clauses.pdf)
* French RFP Clauses: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29207/w8482-241925-french-rfp-clauses.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29207/w8482-241925-french-rfp-clauses.pdf)
